purpose: To outline the implementation approach and PMO setup for executing the digital strategy.
title: Phase 3: Implementation approach and PMO set up to execute the digital strategy

bullets.text: What are the best practices to ensure successful implementation of a digital strategy?
Who will track activities, ownership, metrics and timelines in the implementation process?
What will happen in case of any issues or delays in the process?
How to manage change resulting from a new digital strategy?
How to increase awareness within the organization and maximize the benefits of a new digital strategy?

content_zones.left: Implementation support - Best practices to de-risk the implementation and reduce time to market
content_zones.right: Digital implementation approach and PMO answers the following questions

新增欄位._why_unknown: No data points or chart elements were identified on the slide.
